ingredients.item: 125g Waitrose 1 Summer Blush Strawberries, plus extra to decorate
50ml gin, such as Audemus Pink Pepper Gin, chilled

instructions.step: Hull the strawberries. Put them in a cocktail shaker with the sugar, then crush completely with the end of a rolling pin or a muddling stick.

Add the gin and lime juice, then fill the shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for at least 20 seconds, until very cold, then strain into a chilled glass. Top up with a touch of soda and decorate with some extra strawberry slices.
